definition: MOAR PLEASE: like Jenkins for local,
Javascript-created, non-standard HTML elements. Act like any normal DOM element to the browser.
In the MVC model for AngularJS, changes to the view are immediately reflected in the model, and vise versa.

Passing a software dependency (a service) to a dependent object (a client). In AngularJS, this means our app can use and share values and functionality across it's own components as well as use external modules/apps/etc

Unit testing in AngularJS is eaiser due to dependency injection allowing the test to pull in a component's dependencies resulting in easier mocking up of the original component without digging into global variables.
Manages packages. Installs, updrades, configures, and removes software as well as managing dependencies of that software.
